title: WHen did urf WW leave the store??
body: I've been grinding for blue essence, when i finally reached the amount, I don't see Urf WW and I cpuldn't find a post about special blue essence day on when they were shutting it down. Like when is it coming back? other wise my blue essence is going to stack I don't plan on spending it on anything. Would've been great to get a notification or something because I didn't see a date when this skin was leaving.

replies.body: Just to confirm, ^ this is correct. Urfwick left on Nov 27th along with the rest of the Essence Emporium.
